text: "No Ordinary Love" is a 1992 ballad. It is from the album Love Deluxe by singer Sade. It was in the 1993 movie Indecent Proposal. The song hit #26 in Ireland, United Kingdom and Scotland. In June 1993, the song became a hit across the world. Sade won a Grammy Award for this ballad in early 1994. The full ballad is seven minutes and 21 seconds in length. The single edit is five minutes and 22 seconds. Category:1992 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Sade (band) songs Category:Richard Marx songs Category:Deftones songs
title: No Ordinary Love
